title: Growth Quiz 11

questions.text: What future milestone am I most excited about for us?
choices: Living together or buying a home

questions.text: Where do I see us living in the future?
choices: In a different city or state

questions.text: What shared goal matters most to me for our future?
How important is it that we align on future plans?
choices: Critical - we need to be on the same page
We should each have some independence
It varies by the specific plan

questions.text: What gives me confidence in our future together?
choices: How we support each other's growth

description: Explore how you help each other reach your potential.
